document.full_text: zach randolph had a playoff career-high 34 points and 10 rebounds and the memphis grizzlies powered their way to another playoff upset on sunday.
document.title: grizzlies 114, thunder 101: z-bo, gasol power grizzlies past thunder
lines_and_colors: zach randolph had a playoff career-high 34 points and 10 rebounds and the memphis grizzlies powered their way to another playoff upset on sunday.
